title: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger, Yellow/Black (DCK240C2)
descriptions:
Meet the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit (Model DCK240C2). It’s a simple, reliable set to help you fix things around the house without heavy lifting or confusing steps.

What you get:
- 1 easy-to-use Drill/Driver (DCD771)
- 1 powerful Impact Driver (DCF885) for tougher screws and bolts
- 2 rechargeable 20V batteries
- 1 charger

Why it’s easy to use:
- Light and comfortable: Both tools are compact and lightweight, with an easy-grip handle that’s gentle on hands and wrists.
- Simple speed control: The drill has two speed ranges (slow for careful work, fast for quick jobs). Just slide the switch.
- Easy bit changes: The drill has a 1/2-inch chuck that tightens by hand. The impact driver uses a 1/4-inch “click-in” tip that loads with one hand.
- Bright lights built in: Both tools have LED lights to brighten dark corners. The impact driver has three lights that stay on for about 20 seconds after you release the trigger, so you can see clearly.
- Cordless convenience: No cord to trip over. Just click in a charged battery and go.

What each tool is best for:
- Drill/Driver: Making holes in wood or metal, and driving screws for shelves, hinges, and simple repairs.
- Impact Driver: Removing or installing stubborn screws and bolts, and driving long screws into wood with less effort.

Helpful details:
- Strong performance: Up to 300 UWO (plenty of power for home projects).
- Compact size: Impact driver is about 5.5 inches front to back and weighs about 2.8 lbs—easy to hold.
- Color: Yellow and Black, easy to spot in a drawer or toolbox.

How to get started:
1) Charge both batteries in the included charger.
2) Click a battery into the tool until it locks.
3) Insert a drill bit or screwdriver bit:
   - Drill: open the chuck by hand, insert bit, twist to tighten.
   - Impact Driver: push the bit straight into the front until it clicks.
4) Use the trigger to start slowly. Use the top switch to choose slow or fast on the drill.
5) Let the built-in lights help you see your work area.

This kit is a friendly, get-it-done pair of tools for hanging curtains, assembling furniture, fixing cabinet doors, or tackling weekend projects—without the strain. Clear lights, easy controls, and two batteries mean less waiting and more doing. A dependable choice for everyday home repairs.
